artist: Hans Burgkmair; Matthias Andre Schmidt; Adam Bartsch
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
description: Plates 23-24 (double-page); 8 players on different instruments: Tamerlin, a drum; Quintern, guitar; large lute; ryebebin, rebec or viola; fiddle; small rauschpfeiffen; harp; large rauschpfeiffen. Music-- "Sweet Melody"
title: Music--"Sweet Melody" from The Triumph of Maximilian I
